thread.title: Here’s Your First Look at Pharrell’s New adidas “Human Race” Sneaker
thread.title_full: Here’s Your First Look at Pharrell’s New adidas “Human Race” Sneaker

author: Lia McGarrigle
title: Here’s Your First Look at Pharrell’s New adidas “Human Race” Sneaker
text:
Visit the original post to see all 3 images from this gallery. 
So far this year, Pharrell has twice teased new and unseen versions of his incredibly popular “Human Race” adidas NMDs.
Now, courtesy of Instagram user sneakerprophet_, we can take a sneak peek at what looks like a brand new silhouette from Pharrell and the Three Stripes. The as-yet-unnamed shoe has a multicolored knit upper and appears to have no Boost tooling in the sole.
#pharrell#pharrellwilliams#igsneakers#instakicks#igsneakercommunity #kicks #kicksology#kickstagram #sneaker #soletoday #sneakerlab#sneakerhead #sneakernews #sneakerfiles#solecollector#solepeek#nicekicks#boost#boostvibes#ultraboost#boostheaven#ultraboostuncaged#uncaged#nmd#yeezy 
A post shared by @sneakerprophet_ on Mar 25, 2017 at 7:31pm PDT 

Unlike other previews we’ve gotten from Pharrell, our first look wasn’t a casual shot from the man himself. Instead, the photos from sneakerprophet_ look like an editorial, causing up to speculate if an official announcement will be coming soon.
Check out the gallery above for more images of the shoe, and check back with us for any further updates.
In other sneaker news, here’s how people are wearing the new Nike Air VaporMax .
